s_synopsis: Yo Dudes! Rock'N Scrolllllllll! Slam into the Stone Zone for a wild battle of the bands. It's you and the rest of the Stone Protectors against evil Zok and his whole Sucky group. You get to play Clifford, Cornelius, Chester, Maxwell, or Angus. Make special moves and attacks in scrolling 16-Meg. Solo or two at a time. And go for Monster Hit before they blow you off the stage. You've got cool weapons to fight with, 10 levels to explore, and a whole garage of powerups. So grab your axe and let's jam!
